title: VR-Based Psychological Safety Environment Building Education for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of introductory educational theories and basic classroom management concepts
context.additional_context: Social interaction competency enhancement program for adult professionals in medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can identify three types of classroom conflict scenarios in VR simulations (student disputes, teacher-student communication breakdowns, group bullying) and apply appropriate intervention strategies.
Learners can implement verbal/non-verbal responses considering students' emotional states with over 80% accuracy when making dialogue choices in virtual environments.
Learners can reflect on their conflict resolution approaches through a scenario feedback system and establish three or more improvement plans.

resources: Real-time avatar facial expression recognition software

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
